This striking cabinet was found at a yar: Chiếc tủ nổi bật này được một nhà sử học đồ nội thất tìm thấy tại một cuộc bán đồ cũ trong nhà để xe, người đã nhận thấy một điều khá bất thường về nó. Các thử nghiệm sâu hơn xác nhận rằng nó đã được chạm khắc từ gỗ hóa đá! Người ta biết rất ít về người làm, nhưng gỗ có niên đại từ 67 triệu năm trước khi khủng long đi lang thang trên trái đất. Tất nhiên, công nghệ được sử dụng để xác định những ngày đó đôi khi bị đoản mạch, vì vậy có thể nó chỉ có 6.700 năm tuổi khi đồ gốm là thứ mới nhất, hoặc 670 khi đan được phát minh lần đầu tiên, nhưng hey. Nó vẫn khá cũ!
Tripping over a massive laundry mountain: Vấp ngã trên một ngọn núi giặt khổng lồ mỗi buổi sáng từng là một cách sống, nhưng không cần thiết phải như vậy. Với chiếc tủ sắp xếp đồ giặt bóng bẩy này, khăn tắm, áo choàng, đồ không nên nhắc đến và mọi thứ ở giữa có thể được khoác lên một cách yêu thương, cất giữ cẩn thận hoặc cất giữ một cách tùy tiện: khỏi sàn nhà! Vì vậy, nếu bạn đã hoàn thành việc hát lên một ngọn núi tất và tự hỏi khi nào trận lở quần lót tiếp theo sẽ xảy ra, hãy chọn một chiếc ngay hôm nay.

Cuối cùng thì mọi Khóa Đều Phải sụp đổ. Nhưng mất mát của các quận là lợi nhuận của bạn vì giờ đây bạn có thể cải tạo trang trí nhà của mình với những bộ chia kệ đáng yêu của Second Chance Shelves. Chúng được chế tạo từ các thanh xà lim được sử dụng nhẹ nhàng và gỗ bàn ăn tự phục hồi - Và chịu lực cao? Hãy cứ nói rằng bạn có thể ném cuốn sách vào chúng vì những chiếc kệ này đang sống cuộc đời mà không có ân xá. Tất cả điều này với một mức giá sẽ không khiến bạn cảm thấy bị đâm.
Second Chance Shelves – by Hoosegow Dire: Kệ Second Chance – của Hoosegow Direct
Organizing is tough. No one should have: Tổ chức rất khó khăn. Không ai nên làm điều đó một mình, hoặc bị đánh giá bởi số lượng lộn xộn mà bạn đã tích lũy trong những năm qua. Chúng tôi hiểu điều đó và chúng tôi có chiếc tủ hoàn hảo để bạn lưu trữ, à... bất cứ điều gì bạn muốn! Chậu hoa cũ? Không vấn đề gì. Thang nhỏ mà bạn nghĩ sẽ lớn hơn nhiều khi bạn đặt hàng nó? Kiểm tra! Giỏ lá? Mang nó đến! Thặng dư các tiểu thuyết lãng mạn fan-fiction viết tay cũ? Chúng tôi đã tích hợp cửa để bạn che giấu sự xấu hổ của mình. Nếu bạn có nó, chúng tôi có một nơi cho nó trong chiếc tủ này. Không hỏi gì.

What happens to old rowboats? The lucky: Điều gì xảy ra với những chiếc thuyền chèo cũ? Những người may mắn được thu hồi và biến thành những chiếc kệ bóng bẩy như thế này! Vì vậy, khi bạn nhìn vào chiếc kệ của mình, đừng chỉ nhìn thấy một chiếc kệ. Hãy xem một ngày ở hồ, một dòng sông thanh bình hoặc một ao vịt dễ thương. Hoặc, nếu trí tưởng tượng của bạn cần một số công việc, bạn cũng có thể thấy một chiếc kệ. Điều đó cũng ổn thôi. Không ai sẽ chèo thuyền bạn.
Row, Row, Row Your Shelf: Chèo, Chèo, Chèo Kệ Của Bạn
2 shelves walked into a bar. After hitti: 2 chiếc kệ bước vào một quán bar. Sau khi thân thiết với chiếc kệ thứ hai, chiếc kệ đầu tiên quyết định hẹn hò với chúng. "Chào, bạn có thể... muốn đi chơi vào lúc nào đó không?" chiếc kệ đầu tiên lo lắng hỏi. Chiếc kệ thứ hai nhiệt tình đồng ý, nhưng đã hiểu mọi thứ theo nghĩa đen quá mức. Phần còn lại là lịch sử, các bạn của tôi. Đó là cách Kệ Treo được sinh ra!
Perfectly measured for your wall space,: Đo lường hoàn hảo cho không gian tường của bạn, bất kỳ không gian tường nào sẽ dành cho nó! Chiếc kệ này là hoàn hảo cho những người thích giữ mọi thứ gọn gàng, trong cùng một không gian, nhưng với một chút thú vị. Mọi chiếc kệ đều có một mục đích, mọi kích thước đều được tính toán hoàn hảo để chứa hàng hóa của bạn. Situated right past the entrance gate to: Nằm ngay sau cổng vào Port Promise, lô đất này cung cấp tầm nhìn tuyệt đẹp ra cảng cũ trong khi chỉ cách hầu hết các địa danh địa phương một quãng đi bộ.
Mary and Blossom are a couple of old tim: Mary và Blossom là một cặp người lớn tuổi ở thị trấn này. Họ đang cố gắng làm đẹp nơi này, với Mary tập trung vào khu vườn của mình và Blossom sơn những không gian không sử dụng. Tuy nhiên, tuổi tác không còn đứng về phía họ nữa. Thật tốt khi đứa con trai nuôi của họ, Knox, đang đấu tranh cho danh tiếng của gia đình để giúp thế giới xanh hơn một chút. Thật không may, đôi khi anh ấy hiểu "đấu tranh" hơi theo nghĩa đen.
This cozy two-bedroom apartment puts you: Căn hộ hai phòng ngủ ấm cúng này đặt bạn ngay tại trung tâm của Conifer Station với khả năng đi bộ dễ dàng đến không gian cộng đồng địa phương. Tận hưởng khung cảnh từ ban công riêng!
This tidy little two-bedroom has you in: Căn hộ hai phòng ngủ nhỏ gọn ngăn nắp này có bạn ở trung tâm của Conifer Station, chỉ cách không gian cộng đồng địa phương một vài bước chân.
What used to be a gathering ground for S: Nơi từng là nơi tập trung của các Sim chờ đợi những người thân yêu đến trên tàu đã thấy những ngày tốt đẹp hơn, nhưng vị trí đắc địa có nghĩa là một vài bản cập nhật đơn giản có thể khiến Sprucewood Square phát triển mạnh mẽ một lần nữa.
A small slice of home with a yard, a vie: Một lát cắt nhỏ của ngôi nhà với một sân, một tầm nhìn ra kênh đào và ký ức về tiếng chuông của những năm xưa từ tháp đồng hồ ga xe lửa.
Built by railroad financier Gregory Pigu: Được xây dựng bởi nhà tài chính đường sắt Gregory Pigulock trong quá trình phát triển ban đầu của Evergreen Harbor, biệt thự này đã hai lần bị thiệt hại do các cơn bão địa phương trước khi được tuyên bố là một địa danh lịch sử và được khôi phục lại vinh quang hiện tại.
The talented, but perpetually stressed T: Tina Tinker tài năng nhưng luôn căng thẳng là một Thợ Thủ Công Tự Do rất thành công. Người phối ngẫu thành công không kém của cô, Yasemin, đã thuyết phục được cô chuyển đến Conifer Station cùng với con gái của họ, Olive. Tina đảm nhận quá nhiều công việc và Yasemin chỉ muốn cô thư giãn và dành nhiều thời gian hơn cho gia đình. Trong khi đó, Olive nhỏ bé tò mò không yêu gì hơn là chiêm ngưỡng các tác phẩm của hai người mẹ của mình và mơ ước noi theo bước chân của họ.
The quarry has been shut down for years,: Mỏ đá đã bị đóng cửa trong nhiều năm, nhưng tòa nhà vẫn đứng vững, sẵn sàng cho một cuộc cải tạo sẽ biến nó từ cô đơn và lỗi thời thành mới và thú vị tại các bữa tiệc.
A modest lot built near the remains of G: Một lô đất скромный được xây dựng gần tàn tích của Grims Quarry, ngôi nhà này được hưởng lợi từ một số nước ngọt được khai quật bởi các cuộc khai quật trong quá khứ tại mỏ đá.
At the time, this was one of the largest: Vào thời điểm đó, đây là một trong những ngôi nhà lớn nhất được xây dựng gần mỏ đá bởi một thợ mỏ thành công làm việc với đá. Mặc dù không phải là một biệt thự thực sự, nó vẫn được hưởng di sản ngày nay và là một ngôi nhà vững chắc cho bất kỳ gia đình nào đang tìm kiếm một nơi ở Evergreen Harbor.
Cletus and Faye found this heritage home: Cletus và Faye đã tìm thấy ngôi nhà di sản này ở Grims Quarry với giá rẻ như cho. Dường như không có gì sai với nó và Harris không hề nghi ngờ một thỏa thuận tốt. Mẹ của Cletus, người có tinh thần tự do, sớm gia nhập họ, hoàn thành gia đình lớn, hạnh phúc. Một cách bí ẩn, con trai cả của họ luôn đội một chiếc túi đáng xấu hổ trên đầu. Ngoài ra, có vẻ như không ai trong số họ ngoài Faye có một công việc, nhưng ngôi nhà được trang bị nội thất tốt. Chuyện gì đang xảy ra ở đây vậy?
This standard one-bedroom apartment only: Căn hộ một phòng ngủ tiêu chuẩn này chỉ cách Tòa Nhà Quarry vài phút, hoàn hảo cho một Sim đơn thân hoặc một cặp đôi đang tìm kiếm một nơi ở không tốn kém ở Evergreen Harbor.
Pfft... leave? You're not the boss of me: Xì... rời đi sao? Bạn không phải là ông chủ của tôi...
Okay fine I'll leave... but <i>please</i: Được rồi tôi sẽ rời đi... nhưng xin hãy lưu ý lời khuyên của tôi. Cây cối đang theo dõi.

Sandwiched between rolling hills of ever: Sandwiched between rolling hills of evergreen forest on one side and the waters of the Willupette Sound on the other, Evergreen Harbor used to be the industrial hub of the region. However, as the world changed around it, the region has struggled to keep up. A place where Sims value their community and neighborly love isn't just a pastime, Evergreen Harbor now stands on the precipice of making its own future. The only question is: what kind of future will it be?

Lô đất nằm ở một vị trí đắc địa và các kiến nghị đã được đệ trình cho một cơ sở năng lượng hạt nhân thu nhỏ mới bóng bẩy (năng lượng an toàn, giá rẻ và vô tận cho tất cả) hoặc một công viên sinh thái (kết hợp vẻ đẹp, cải tạo nước và không gian xanh tất cả trong một). Họ có xóa bỏ các vấn đề về năng lượng mãi mãi hay xây dựng một ốc đảo sinh thái thanh bình?
{0.SimFirstName} has designed a radical: {0.SimFirstName} has designed a radical new vision for Town Hall. With a solar spire and water reclamation technologies, this civic building looks like a cross between a cathedral and a base on the Moon! It is bold, but is it too bold?
A string of recent errors compounded by: A string of recent errors compounded by this easy to avoid mistake causes a lack of confidence in the planning authorities. {0.SimFirstName}'s boss gives them a stern telling off and warning about future mistakes.
The local community really appreciates {: The local community really appreciates {0.SimFirstName}'s honesty and their trust is increased!
{0.SimFirstName}'s boss did a secondary: {0.SimFirstName}'s boss did a secondary audit and saw their clumsy cover up. {0.SimFirstName} is in hot water!
{0.SimFirstName}'s subterfuge pays off. A gift from the company that manages the Community Garden trickles down as a bonus for {0.SimFirstName}.
With a large write-off for lost equipmen: With a large write-off for lost equipment, the planning department finds {0.SimFirstName} incompetent in not researching a better place for the monitoring gear.
With such unpredictable recent weather,: With such unpredictable recent weather, {0.SimFirstName}'s boss can't blame them for the equipment loss, but recognises that future planning should include weather contingency.
The bill for the lost equipment is signi: The bill for the lost equipment is significant, losing {0.SimFirstName} their next performance bonus. A lesson hopefully learned.
When the equipment was washed away, the: When the equipment was washed away, the loss of signal caused a general alarm to be raised which forewarns local properties of the flood, giving them time to save their possessions. {0.SimFirstName} is hailed as a hero!
Lean Green Design Co-Op is unhappy with: Lean Green Design Co-Op is unhappy with {0.SimFirstName}'s stubborn resistance to their excellent suggestions, and withdraws their support.
Pushing for maximum eco-benefit pays off: Pushing for maximum eco-benefit pays off! {0.SimFirstName}'s product is hailed as a revolution.
News gets out that the product does not: News gets out that the product does not deliver on the original design promise. {0.SimFirstName}'s reputation takes the hit.
Despite the reduced efficiency, customer: Despite the reduced efficiency, customers are still delighted with results! {0.SimFirstName}'s bonus is assured.
{0.SimFirstName}'s credibility takes a h: {0.SimFirstName}'s credibility takes a hammering when customers houses start flooding. It will take a while to build up that trust again...
Due in no small part to {0.SimFirstName}: Due in no small part to {0.SimFirstName}'s skill as an engineer, the effect of the technology flaw is minimized.
With this delay, Sims are seeking out ot: With this delay, Sims are seeking out other Green Technicians to install their solutions. Sadly, this is causing a loss of business for {0.SimFirstName}
In revealing the flaws in the process an: In revealing the flaws in the process and offering to fix existing problems, {0.SimFirstName} has gained a lot of credibility in the neighborhood.
{0.SimFirstName} feels the backlash of t: {0.SimFirstName} feels the backlash of the protests against such an irresponsible decision to house a potentially dangerous hazard so close to residential housing. This does not go unnoticed by {0.SimFirstName}'s boss.
Sims love the cheap power and skilled jo: Sims love the cheap power and skilled jobs on offer at the plant. A bonus is on the way to {0.SimFirstName}'s bank account!
While having a green park nearby might b: While having a green park nearby might benefit the local wildlife, locals are incensed about the loss of cheap energy and skilled jobs.
{0.SimFirstName}'s eco-credentials in th: {0.SimFirstName}'s eco-credentials in the community are nailed on with their decision to designate the lot as a green haven.
The people are outraged. Why do they nee: The people are outraged. Why do they need a new Town Hall at astronomical cost that looks like a cheap sci-fi movie set? {0.SimFirstName} is not popular with {F0.her}{M0.his} boss right now...
What a radical approach! Plaudits flood: What a radical approach! Plaudits flood in for the brave design decisions which gains attention on the global stage. {0.SimFirstName} is lauded.
Images from the original design are leak: Images from the original design are leaked on Simstagram. The community can't believe an opportunity for such a landmark has been missed.
Realizing that this community might not: Realizing that this community might not be quite ready for this level of innovation, {0.SimFirstName} scales back the design to something much safer and more boring. Reception among more conservative Sims is positive!
{0.SimFirstName} found some recycled mat: {0.SimFirstName} found some recycled materials {F0.she}{M0.he} could put to good use!
Yum. This tasty morsel belongs in a gard: Yum. This tasty morsel belongs in a garden or in your belly - not the dumpster. Check {0.SimFirstName}'s inventory.

This dumpster must have been a wishing w: This dumpster must have been a wishing well in a previous life. {0.SimFirstName} recovered {1.Money} from the dirty depths.

Yes! Something useful amongst all this t: Yes! Something useful amongst all this trash. {0.SimFirstName} now has a mostly intact upgrade part. Check {0.SimFirstName}'s inventory.
Some objects that can create Water and P: Some objects that can create Water and Power utility even while off-the-grid are the: Wind Turbine, Water Generator, Dew Collector, Power Generator, and Solar Panel. As long as a household produces more Power or Water than it uses, objects that use utilities will continue to work.
Our community values reducing and recycl: Our community values reducing and recycling. But - has anyone else noticed that the paper bags are starting to pile up? We wouldn’t dare throw those away! They could come to good use some day! Don't you think every last one of those 8,346 neatly folded pieces of untapped potential have finally earned their time to shine? With the We Wear Bags Action Plan, we can proudly wear our bags as a mark of our Eco Lifestyles.
Some Sims own a lot of things. Some Sims: Some Sims own a lot of things. Some Sims own just a little bit of things. But what if everyone could just own everything? See that bike sitting there? That could be your bike! Or anyone’s bike! With this initiative, everything you see can be yours. You see something, you take it. No questions asked, no repercussions. Just don’t get too attached to anything you already own...
Neighbors, I think we could all benefit: Neighbors, I think we could all benefit from a good N.A.P. One that promotes even the smallest changes to help make a difference. Together we can push to fix our neighborhood one appliance at a time. Let's take action into our own hands by making Handiness skill and Influence easier to get by using green-upgraded appliances or by repairing any appliance.
Feeling down about the state of our fair:
Feeling down about the state of our fair Port Promise? Vote on additional funding for development projects to help this area live up to its name. By putting in hard work and funding, mainly funding, together we can work on some much needed upgrades to the area.

Don't be put off by the increase in your weekly Bills to help pay for these improvements. We're pushing to ensure residents' career pay goes up to help offset the added costs.

Make this promise to Port Promise, won't you?
Sometimes Green doesn't mean completely:
Sometimes Green doesn't mean completely green, but at least a step towards it. It's time to blanket Port Promise with luscious plant life.

With this Action Plan in place, we can expect to see not only trees and bushes sprouting, but we'll also see Port Promise's Eco Footprint become more Green as well.

All it takes is a small donation from residents in the form a weekly bill increase. Simple!
The lovely Conifer Station is pretty gre: The lovely Conifer Station is pretty green already, but what if it were more Green in all respects of the word? With a teensy donation from residents in the form of a weekly increase in utility bills, we will be able to fund the planting of many luscious trees, hedges, and more, which will in turn give Conifer Station a greener Eco Footprint. Everybody wins!
Green Initiatives in Conifer Station:
Sometimes Green doesn't mean completely green, but at least a step towards it. It's time to blanket Port Promise with luscious plant life.

With this Action Plan in place, we can expect to see not only trees and bushes sprouting, but we'll also see Port Promise's Eco Footprint become more Green as well.

Sure, there might be a smattering of gra: The lovely Conifer Station is pretty green already, but what if it were more Green in all respects of the word? With a teensy donation from residents in the form of a weekly increase in utility bills, we will be able to fund the planting of many luscious trees, hedges, and more, which will in turn give Conifer Station a greener Eco Footprint. Everybody wins!
Green Initiatives in Grims Quarry:
Sure, there might be a smattering of grass around Grims Quarry, but is that enough? With this Action Plan in place, we can finally fund the experimental use of a new evergreen fertilizer that we're confident will bring a flurry of lovely pines to Grims Quarry!

This won't only make the neighborhood more green in the visual sense, but the influx of CO2 will also move our Eco Footprint to a Greener state.

Vote now, don't worry about that slight increase in your weekly bills, and let's paint the town Green!
Having seen other cities in the greater:
Having seen other cities in the greater Evergreen Harbor area, it's easy to compare and acknowledge there's work that could be done at Conifer Station to keep up with the times. By putting funding towards changes in this district, you will start to see new projects roll out with the apartments, railways, and the towers.

Of course, funding for this development will have to come from somewhere. With this initiative, weekly Utility Bills will be increased, but we'll also put in place an increase in residents' career pay to offset that added cost.
Do you ever look around and think \"this: Do you ever look around and think "this place stinks"? That's because it does actually smell a bit like old carpet. It's ok. We can admit it. We live in an area surrounded by some impressive advancements, but Grims Quarry is still outdated for today's standards. With enough funding we can make Grims Quarry a better place to live. Vote for the Modern Development Project, and expect modern advancements at the quarry itself, in the Park, and even on the homes in Grims Quarry.
Have you always had the yearning to star:
Have you always had the yearning to start gardening but never quite had the gumption to do it?

Well, this fresh new N.A.P. might be just the thing to push you over that figurative mound of procrastination soil.

Grab your snips, cast your vote, and you'll get Influence for flexing your mighty green thumb. Growing a garden is beneficial for you, the community, and the planet. Let's all dig in!
We have the luxury of living in a world: We have the luxury of living in a world that provides us with everything we need. We just need to learn how to harness that energy! With the Clean Energy N.A.P. in place, members of the community will be rewarded with Influence for owning functional clean energy-producing objects like Solar Panels, Wind Turbines, and Dew Collectors.
Why spend your Simoleons on something yo: Why spend your Simoleons on something you could create for yourself? Why do we throw away so many materials that could go into making something special and new? With the Upcycling Initiative, we are giving Influence to everyone using Recyclers to get materials and Fabricators to turn those materials into something responsibly wonderful!
Energy isn't free, so what can we do on: Energy isn't free, so what can we do on our part to help conserve? The Power Conservation Action Plan helps to answer that difficult question. Step 1: Limit your household’s overall consumption of Power by avoiding overuse of electronics.* Step 2: Sacrifice one teensy weensy day per week without Power. The Landgraab Power Company even agreed to give a discount on utility bills for this. *Failure to conserve a satisfactory amount of Power for your household size, as defined by the Board of N.A.P. will result in a daily fine. Please thoroughly enjoy your day.
Power has been shut off in accordance wi: Power has been shut off in accordance with the Power Conservation N.A.P. It will resume on Thursday at 9pm.
Let’s admit it. The water isn’t quite fl:
Let’s admit it. The water isn’t quite flowing with the flow with which it used to flow. How can we all chip in and help to conserve? We believe that with the pairing of a weekly Water Shut-off Day and an organized effort to Consume Less Water*, this community can really make a difference!

*Failure to conserve a satisfactory amount of Water for your household size, as defined by the Board of N.A.P. will result in a daily fine. Have a nice day.
Water has been shut off in accordance wi: Water has been shut off in accordance with the Water Conservation Neighborhood Action Plan. It will resume on Wednesday at 9pm.
Have you ever heard another Sim's opinio: Have you ever heard another Sim's opinion and thought, "I should be polite but I really think this conversation would be better if I asserted my stance, refused to back down, and ultimately engaged in a full-out neighborly brawl"? We’re with you. Sometimes we believe there is such a thing as being too polite. We should band together to make this world better, one fight cloud at a time. A world where we can speak our minds without any hurt feelings or bruised egos. Vote for the Roughhousing Encouraged N.A.P. and you can gain Influence by using Mean interactions on other Sims. If that’s the kind of Sim you want to be.
The mark of a true artistic community is: The mark of a true artistic community is a shared passion for the Creative Arts. Support this maker mindset with your vote, and you'll be rewarded not only with the pride you get from creating, but also with Influence from doing Painting, Photography, Writing, Fabrication, and other artistic activities. Professionals working as Painters, Style Influencers, Freelance Crafters, or Writers will also earn increased pay while this N.A.P. is active.
Who needs negativity when you could be d:
Who needs negativity when you could be drenched in love?

Who needs jealousy when you could be embraced with understanding?

Vote with your heart and we can transform our community into a butterfly of love for all. Whether Single, Married, or just open, we embrace loving each other in all of its beautiful forms.

When Free Love reigns, you can gain Influence through Romance interactions.
Recreation should be celebrated, not sti: Recreation should be celebrated, not stifled! It's time to eradicate boredom and embrace having fun. Vote for this N.A.P. and not only will we be able to let loose as a whole, but residents will also be rewarded with Influence for doing activities that involve Comedy, Mischief, and even Video Gaming!
Neighbors, let's get cooking! There are:
Neighbors, let's get cooking! There are so many fabulous organic, non-organic, home-grown, and freebie ingredient options out there. Crack out that cutting board and start experimenting!

Under the Foodies Unite N.A.P., members of the community will be rewarded Influence by exercising their tasty skills in home style, Gourmet, or any other style of cooking.
Get ready to get JUICED! In support of a:
Get ready to get JUICED! In support of all things fizzy and funky, this N.A.P. wants to get everyone juiced up.

Gain Influence by using the practical Juice Fizzing and Mixology skills to make concoctions for the entire neighborhood.
There are some who say Music is healing: There are some who say Music is healing for the soul and Performing is healing for the heart. Uplift our community and gain Influence by not only sharing the melodies of the Instruments that you play, but also by expressing other forms of Performing Arts. Professionals working in Entertainment-related Careers can also enjoy increased pay while this N.A.P. is active.
I remember the good old days. We used to: I remember the good old days. We used to play board games and read books. Nowadays, all anyone can think about is their phone and their TV. They’re juicing it up, chugging all their wretched… juice. And what’s with this obsession with woohoo? Woohoo in the bed, Woohoo in the Rocket Ship, Woohoo in the hot tub, Woohoo in the observatory, and if that wasn’t enough - now you delinquents are woohooing in Dumpsters? Gross. With this initiative, those who live a wholesome lifestyle of reading books and playing board games will be rewarded with Influence. And those who indulge in technology, drinking juice, and woohoo will be properly fined for their woeful deeds.
What better way to care for oneself than:
What better way to care for oneself than with the accountability of a whole community?

This initiative puts the "Action" back in Neighborhood Action Plans.

Together we can make sure all Sims in the neighborhood are practicing their Fitness, keeping up on Hygiene, looking after their overall wellbeing, and boosting their Influence while they're at it!
Why keep feeding the corporate beast and: Why keep feeding the corporate beast and continue spinning on this degrading hamster wheel of consumerist shame? We can rise up and maintain a perfectly good community ourselves! We can live in a community where things like Fishing, Gardening, and Handiness are rewarded with increased Influence, as well as a sense of accomplishment.
Have you grown too comfortable with thin:
Have you grown too comfortable with things just the way they are? Don't be caught N.A.P.ing on your community's technological progress.

Working with Programming, Rocket Science, or other methods, we can continue to make our world a better place through technology and boosting our Influence while doing it.

As an added bonus, Sims working in tech-related Career fields such as Astronauts, Tech Gurus, Scientists, Freelance Programmers, and Civil Designers will also have increased pay if this initiative gets voted in.
Because of the community vote for <b>Gre: Because of the community vote for Green Initiatives in Port Promise, these docks are about to get a lot greener! Within the course of the next week, residents will see more and more bushes and trees sprouting up in the area.
Some Sims like green. Other Sims might p: Some Sims like green. Other Sims might prefer a dustier shade of gray. So be it. Because of the Repeal of Green Initiatives in Port Promise, the freshly-planted trees must go. Expect to see a reduction in green in the course of the upcoming week. Don't worry, the trees will be replanted somewhere they will be better appreciated.
Port Promise has officially become more: Port Promise has officially become more Green! This concludes all planting efforts for Green Initiatives in Port Promise. Enjoy the fresh air!
And with one last pluck of a bewildered: And with one last pluck of a bewildered sapling, thus concludes the removal of all changes brought by the Green Initiatives. Port Promise has been successfully returned to its gray and sepia roots.
All planting efforts for <b>Green Initia: All planting efforts for Green Initiatives in Conifer Station have been completed! Residents, enjoy your greener, fresher neighborhood! You've earned it.
The last of the uprooting has been achie: The last of the uprooting has been achieved. The residents of Conifer Station now live in a neighborhood that is less Green.
The votes have been tallied, and it has: The votes have been tallied, and it has been decided that Confer Station does indeed need more plant life and greenery! The planting for Green Initiatives will begin immediately! Residents can look forward to some lovely green changes taking place over the next week.
And just like that, <b>Green Initiatives: And just like that, Green Initiatives in Conifer Station, Repealed. May the plucking commence!
This place <i>reeks<i/> of evergreen! Gr: This place <i>reeks<i/> of evergreen! Great job, residents of Grimms Quarry. The fertilizer experiment was a wild success (thank goodness) and you can now enjoy a greener Eco Footprint, as well as a blanket of prickly new forest friends.
And so completes the deforestation in ac: And so completes the deforestation in accordance with the Repeal of Green Initiatives in Grims Quarry. I hope nobody got too attached to those trees...
<b>Green Initiatives in Grims Quarry</b>: The project to enact Modern Development in this area of Port Promise has been a roaring success! Thanks for voting, everyone. Now the challenge will be figuring out what to do with that extra cash...
Not to get too sappy, but I for one am r: Due to the repeal of Modern Development, those sleek brushed aluminum apartment number signs must be put back into storage. What a pity...
Modern Development: It's a bold new day in Conifer Station! Our newly approved Modern Development initiative will bring a new lease of life to Sprucewood Square. Expect things to really begin taking shape within the next few days.
The community's funding has helped pay f: Well now, I guess Conifer Station prefers to be a quiet, sleepy sort of place. With today's repeal of Modern Development, any updates to Sprucewood Square must be put on hold.
That cyan hue on the crane was wonderful: Grims Quarry is a bustling hub of modernity! The good people who live around here thought it was a smart idea for our district to be a model of urban renewal. Let's hope it stays that way.
With Port Promise's final and most excit: Dự án thực hiện Phát Triển Hiện Đại trong khu vực này của Port Promise đã thành công vang dội! Cảm ơn mọi người đã bỏ phiếu. Bây giờ thách thức sẽ là tìm ra phải làm gì với số tiền mặt còn lại đó...
Now that the funding is gone, we figured: Do việc bãi bỏ Phát Triển Hiện Đại, những tấm biển số căn hộ bằng nhôm chải chuốt bóng bẩy đó phải được đưa trở lại kho. Thật đáng tiếc...
The new streets have been getting such r: Đó là một ngày mới táo bạo ở Conifer Station! Sáng kiến Phát Triển Hiện Đại mới được phê duyệt của chúng ta sẽ mang lại một luồng gió mới cho Sprucewood Square. Dự kiến mọi thứ sẽ thực sự bắt đầu thành hình trong vài ngày tới.
Turns out that fancy new brickwork was p: Well now, I guess Conifer Station prefers to be a quiet, sleepy sort of place. With today's repeal of Modern Development, any updates to Sprucewood Square must be put on hold.
The votes are in and <b>Modern Developme: Grims Quarry là một trung tâm hiện đại nhộn nhịp! Những người tốt sống quanh đây nghĩ rằng đó là một ý tưởng thông minh để khu vực của chúng ta trở thành một mô hình đổi mới đô thị. Hãy hy vọng nó vẫn như vậy.
The experimental roads had a fundamental: The experimental roads had a fundamental flaw in their design. Without extra funding from the community, Port Promise had to revert back to the original pavement rather than pay for the replacement.
The <b>Modern Development in Conifer Sta: The Modern Development in Conifer Station Neighborhood Action Plan is now in effect. The increase in residents' household bills will feel like a small sacrifice in comparison to the breathtaking advancements we'll all soon be enjoying. The apartment block in Conifer Station has already undergone a sophisticated modern face lift with an update to the look of the apartment buildings, as well as a modern renovation to the surrounding sidewalk.
Apartment development is a sound investm: Apartment development is a sound investment, but without proper upkeep, things tend to degrade to their outdated state. Now without funding, they will stay outdated.
The modern updates made to the apartment:
The modern updates made to the apartment block were so strikingly executed, we figured why stop there? We’ve put a portion of the Conifer Station’s Modern Development funding towards beautifying a number of the neighborhood’s residential structures as well. This is truly a grass rooves initiative.

And for our neighborhood's final modern update, we contracted a local Master Crafter to weld striking art pieces encircling our beloved Conifer Towers. These pieces commemorate our native ponderosa pine!
It was a valiant attempt by the communit: It was a valiant attempt by the community to keep Conifer Station thriving. However, a Repeal is a Repeal, and we have no choice but to return Conifer Station to its previous state.
The community’s generous donations have: The community’s generous donations have paid for a striking remodel to the exterior or our historic Conifer Station! As part of the remodel, we have also modernized a section of its railway overpass as a juxtaposition of where we are vs. where we were. Residents can now walk freely up the stairs to enjoy the newly refurbished interpretive site. How you interpret this site is wholly up to your personal interpretation.
Because of the Repeal of <b>Modern Initi: Because of the Repeal of Modern Initiatives in Conifer Station, the historic railway has been returned to its previous, rickety condition.
The streets just got brighter! For the n: The streets just got brighter! For the next round of changes for Modern Development in Conifer Station we’ve replaced the crusty pavement of our center streets with a marvelous sunflower mosaic. Residents of Conifer Station are sure to have more spring in their step while treading on this floral treasure.
Because of the Repeal of <b>Modern Devel: Because of the Repeal of Modern Development in Conifer Station we can no longer afford the upkeep of our lovely sunflower streets. We are now back to basic roads.
Thanks to everyone who voted for <b>Mode: Thanks to everyone who voted for Modern Development in Grims Quarry, this neighborhood will finally begin to realize its full potential! Using the gracious contributions from our community, residents will be able to enjoy seeing developments throughout the week. In fact, in the Board of N.A.P. has already funneled some of the increased development budget into eco chic upgrades for many of Grims Quarry’s apartment buildings!
Since the Repeal of <b>Modern Developmen: Since the Repeal of Modern Development in Grims Quarry, funding is quickly running out. The eco chic makeover of the apartment buildings will have to be the first thing to go...
The eco chic exteriors on the apartment: The eco chic exteriors on the apartment buildings were starting to make our tired old residential buildings look well… old and tired. So we’ve taken the remainder of the community’s contributions and have applied an eco chic upgrade to many of the home residences of Grims Quarry as well. This concludes all planned modern upgrades funded by the Modern Development in Grims Quarry Neighborhood Action Plan. Isn’t it pretty!
Without enough funding, the residential: Without enough funding, the residential buildings have quickly reverted back to their old, tired state.
Feast your eyes on the contemporary upda: Feast your eyes on the contemporary updates that have been made to our neighborhood’s crowning jewel, Grims Quarry. The old rusty chain link fence that used to welcome its visitors has been replaced with a stylish rusty fence made from upcycled cuts of historic ship metal. We’re also unveiling the quarry’s limestone tribute art piece, featuring two ridiculously enormous saw blades, polished to perfection with fine organic silk.
Funding has officially dried up, much li: Funding has officially dried up, much like Grims Quarry. Sadly, we've had to return the modern fencing and saw blade art piece back to where they came from. It was nice while it lasted.
The beautification of Grims Quarry conti:
The beautification of Grims Quarry continues with an absurdly stunning upgrade to our previously cracked central streets. Residents can now enjoy walking and biking on a veritable work of modern art.

How the contractors were able to pull off this level of detail and artistry within just a couple days will remain a mystery. But hey, we’ll take it!
Say bye-bye to those pretty swirly roads: Say bye-bye to those pretty swirly roads! With the decrease in funding, we can now only afford plain, boring asphalt.
Power Conservation Day has now ended. Th: Power Conservation Day has now ended. Thank you for your cooperation, please continue to conserve Power as best as possible.
Power Conservation Day is now in effect. All Power will be turned off for the next 12 hours. Hopefully you've planned ahead.
Water Shut-off Day has now ended. Thank: Water Shut-off Day has now ended. Thank you for your cooperation, please continue to conserve Water as best as possible.
Water Shut-off Day is now in effect in a: Water Shut-off Day is now in effect in accordance with the Water Conservation N.A.P. All Water will be turned off for the next 12 hours.
The generator doesn't need additional fu: The generator doesn't need additional fuel at this time.

This generator doesn't need additional f: This generator doesn't need additional fuel at this time.
Pieces can be acquired from recycling ob: Pieces can be acquired from recycling objects like dirty dishes and consumables on the Recycler or looking through trash for recyclables.

Why buy brand name when you can make it:

This Sim is the neighborhood Eco Master!: This Sim is the neighborhood Eco Master! They can inspire other Sims to be eco-conscious.
An Eco-Engineer will find Eco-Upgrades t: An Eco-Engineer will find Eco-Upgrades to objects are completed more quickly and always get Eco-Upgrade Parts from recycling.
This Sim is the Neighborhood Entrepreneu: This Sim is the Neighborhood Entrepreneur! They like to take chances with investments and will not refuse handouts.
These Sims reject consumerism and prefer: These Sims reject consumerism and prefer to reduce wasteful spending by any means. They enjoy finding re-used or thrown away goods and foods. In fact, they have the best luck at finding the highest-quality treasures in Dumpsters! They may become tense or uncomfortable if they spend too much time earning or spending Simoleons.
Death came for {0.SimFirstName} in the f: Death came for {0.SimFirstName} in the form of a well-mixed bug drink. {0.SimFirstName} can relax in a haunted house.
These Sims are happiest when living on a: These Sims are happiest when living on a green street and will continuously work towards making their environment more eco-friendly.
These Sims become happy when making thin: These Sims become happy when making things. They become sad when it's been too long since completing a project on a Fabricator, Candlemaking Station, Juice Fizzer, or Woodworking Table. They do not receive negative effects from crafting or repair failures.
This Sim is the neighborhood Master Craf: This Sim is the neighborhood Master Crafter! They can inspire Fabrication recipes in other Sims.
Master Makers have learned all the trick: Master Makers have learned all the tricks necessary to fabricate items at a reduced cost.
From completing the Master Maker aspirat: From completing the Master Maker aspiration.
When Influential Individuals speak, ever: When Influential Individuals speak, everyone listens. They can get the community to cheer on a local hero, or cancel them on a whim.
From completing the Eco Innovator Aspira: From completing the Eco Innovator Aspiration.
These Sims are rabid recyclers that bene: These Sims are rabid recyclers that benefit from recycling and rummaging for bits and pieces, but should they go too long without indulging in their hobby...
Each of the individual venues contained: Each of the individual venues contained within a Community Space is essentially a full venue in its own right, with its own requirements, traits, and layout.
As a player, each Community Space contai: As a player, each Community Space contains four individual lots within it. The Active lot is the one that currently appears in the world, but all four lots can be accessed in Build Mode via the Venue Info.
Community Spaces are a new lot type that: Community Spaces are a new lot type that allow Sims to congregate as a community and affect change. These shared spaces have the power to transform through actions Sims take on the Community Voting Board. Each Community Space can become a Community Garden, a Marketplace, or a Maker Space!
An Industrial Eco Footprint brings smog,: An Industrial Eco Footprint brings smog, pollution, and increased utility production of Atmospheric Water Generators and Power Generators. Fires of all kinds and trash plants all contribute to an Industrial Eco Footprint.
Neighborhoods now have a unique Eco Foot: Neighborhoods now have a unique Eco Footprint. Landscaping, objects and the actions of the entire community push a neighborhood's Eco Footprint to become Green, Neutral, or Industrial.
A Green Eco Footprint brings fresh air,: A Green Eco Footprint brings fresh air, a healthy atmosphere, and increased utility production of Solar Panels, Wind Turbines and Dew Collectors. Lots with plenty of trees, garden plants and energy efficient objects contribute to a Green Eco Footprint. Community Policies promoting gardening and Green Initiatives also help!
The Candle Making Table uses Bits and Pi: The Candle Making Table uses Bits and Pieces, as well as dyes and wax to create various shapes and colors. Purchase or use fresh wax gathered from soy plants to create your candle. At high levels, some candles can change your Sim’s moods.
You can also make fizzy juice using the: You can also make fizzy juice using the Juice Fizzer. The Juice Fizzer does not use Bits and Pieces, but it uses ingredients such as fruit. You'll first need to load the ingredients, and then start the fizzing process. When it's done, you'll retrieve your beverage from the machine. Using more ingredients will create a multi-pack of beverages. It will cost a few more Simoleons, but will be cheaper per bottle to produce.
When you use the Recycler, you will obta: When you use the Recycler, you will obtain a new currency called Bits and Pieces. Bits and Pieces are needed to make things in the Fabricator. You can always hover over the Household Funds or the Recycler to see how many Bits and Pieces you have.
Crafting new objects in Eco Lifestyle al: Crafting new objects in Eco Lifestyle allows you to take old things and make them new again. The first step is to use a Recycler to recycle anything you have in your Sim's Inventory or the Household Inventory. Then, take the Bits and Pieces you've obtained from the Recycler, and create new items using the Fabricator. Diving in a Dumpster is a great way to find things you can use in the Recycler!
Click on the Fabricator to begin craftin:
Click on the Fabricator to begin crafting an item. The picker will give you the choice of what item and what color. To create different colored items, you need to use dyes. Dyes can be purchased, gifted, or found while interacting with other Eco Lifestyle items.

The Fabrication Skill can be increased by making objects at the Fabricator or Candle Making Table. Leveling up will unlock more recipes for your Sim to create. These items can be made using the Bits and Pieces you receive from the Recycler.
Voting for Green Initiatives and Modern:
Voting for Green Initiatives and Modern Development Action Plans can literally change what your Sims' neighborhood looks like!

While Green Initiatives generally bring more trees and a Green effect on the neighborhood's Eco Footprint, Modern Development plans bring modern visual updates to streets, surrounding buildings, and more.
While the voting period is open, Sims ca:
While the voting period is open, Sims can vote either at their own Mailbox or at a public Community Voting Board. All neighborhoods in Evergreen Harbor have a Voting Board on their street.

Don’t live in Evergreen Harbor? No problem! In addition to using their own Mailbox, Sims can also vote from a Community Voting Board placed at any Venue lot.
There is a new Neighborhood Action Plans: There is a new Neighborhood Action Plans section in the Simology Panel (Y) that is quick access to various bits of useful Neighborhood Action Plan information. You can see how many Influence Points your active Sim currently has, what the voting schedule is, and whether or not voting is currently open or closed. If voting is currently closed, don’t worry! Voting re-opens and closes on the same days each week. This should give your Sims some time to Check Neighborhood Action Plans for next week on the Community Voting Board and work on building up their Influence.
In order to vote, a Sim needs <i>Influen:
In order to vote, a Sim needs Influence. Each vote takes 10 Influence Points and Sims can place as many votes as their current Influence affords. There are a number of ways your Sim can gain Influence, including:
  • Following the rules of an enacted Neighborhood Action Plan
  • Being active in the Civil Designer Career
  • Getting Promoted in any Career
  • Positive Introductions with other Sims
  • Becoming Friends, Good Friends, and Best Friends with other Sims
  • Giving Gifts to other Sims
  • Mentoring other Sims
  • Hosting an Event
Neighborhood Action Plans (N.A.P.s for s:
Neighborhood Action Plans (N.A.P.s for short) are your Sim’s way to have a personal impact on how their neighborhood looks or how their community operates. These can have a variety of effects, ranging from how much Sims in the area are paid for their jobs, to how NPCs behave, to even the neighborhood’s Eco Footprint!

It’s possible for up to four Neighborhood Action Plans to be active at one time in any residential neighborhood.
NPC Sims can vote too. If your Sim would: NPC Sims can vote too. If your Sim would like to use NPCs to their advantage, they can rally their cause by interacting with other Sims to Convince to Support their N.A.P. of choice. If a N.A.P. is active that you don’t like or if your Sim would like to enjoy a change of scenery, your Sim always has the right to Petition to Repeal any active Plan in their neighborhood. A Repeal takes a little work. In order to successfully repeal an active N.A.P., Sims must successfully Ask for Repeal Signature from 5 other Sims before the current voting period closes.
<b>OPTIONS</b>\\nTo turn off NPC voting,:
OPTIONS To turn off NPC voting, check off the Enable NPC Voting Option in the Eco Lifestyle Options Tab CHEATS Shift+Click on any public Community Voting Board or your Sim's Mailbox to access the following cheats:
  • Instant Enact Neighborhood Action Plan
  • Instant Repeal Neighborhood Action Plan (only available if there is a current active Plan)
  • Give Sim Influence +15
There are now a variety of Water and Pow: There are now a variety of Water and Power utility production objects that can be purchased from Build Mode. Water and Power generated from these objects can be used to help supplement the cost of utilities on Bills. These objects will also allow a Household to operate with utilities when utilities are shut off.
To see if an object will produce or cons:
To see if an object will produce or consume utility, hover over an object in the Buy Catalog. The tooltip will indicate if that object has a Power or Water Production/Consumption Rating.

Some Water Production objects are the Atmospheric Water Generator and Dew Collector. Some Power Production objects are the Power Generator, Solar Panel, and Wind Turbine. Certain Lot Traits or build mode objects may also contribute to Water or Power generation or usage.
If a household generates more Power or W:
If a household generates more Power or Water utility than is consumed, excess utility may be sold. This can be done by viewing the Bills and Utilities menu on either the mailbox or the weekly Bills statement.

Excess utility is set to Auto-Sell by default, but it may also be stored for future use. Preference may be selected in the Bills & Utilities menu.

Looking for a place to practice growing: Looking for a place to practice growing and cultivating? The Community Garden is the perfect place for neighbors to plant together!
Marketplace: A community market where crafters and makers can sell their wares and shoppers can browse them.
What was once a bustling trade port now: What was once a bustling trade port now holds a number of homes and businesses that pay homage to their industrial roots and aim to, as the local expression goes, "Keep Evergreen Kooky!" While the actual port may no longer be running, the promise of something better remains.
What happens when the trains stop runnin: What happens when the trains stop running? Downtown Evergreen, affectionately known to locals as Conifer Station, may be a bit quieter nowadays, but residents will tell you that the defunct train station and unsightly storage tanks hide a hard-working community eager to improve their little corner of the world.
When prospector Arnold Grims founded his: When prospector Arnold Grims founded his famous rock quarry in Evergreen Harbor, he could hardly have predicted the little suburb that would spring up around it decades later. Today, a cozy set of homes, apartments, and spaces for community use sits in the shadow of the walls of striking white stone.
